name: Pac-Man: Infinite
description:
!! Looking for feedback for my dissertation !!

Please fill in the form below to help me with my evaluation in my report:

https://forms.gle/1FBvFK3PMcGj5E2JA

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Explore an infinite Pac-Man level that continuously grows as you play. Using maze generation techniques, new maze segments are created during runtime to provide endless content for the player. All the original Pac-Man rules apply, however, more ghosts will spawn the longer you play, increasing the difficulty.

Try and get a high score and beat your friends. Have fun!
